channel.title: Suggestion about making chat messages stand out
channel.description:
(Repost from Steam Discussions)
It would be cool if, when you're in game, there would play a sound effect whenever somebody sends a message in the chat. It would help distinguish messages from players and voting notifications. As a person who comes from ToS the lack of this feature slightly bugs me.

item.title: Suggestion about making chat messages stand out
item.dc:creator: Komtur
item.description:
Does work in ToS though

Read full topic
